Routine Descriptions

RBSP_EFW_APPLY_L1_TIME_TAG_CORRECTION

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Apply the time tag correction to a certain L1 tplot var.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_apply_l1_time_tag_correction.pro)

RBSP_EFW_APPLY_L1_TIME_TAG_NUDGE

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Shift the EFW time tag backward in time by the data cadence.
 This is needed b/c the timg tags are off by 1/16 or 1/32 sec.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_apply_l1_time_tag_nudge.pro)

RBSP_EFW_FIND_L1_TIME_TAG_IRREGULARITY

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Scan L1 esvy and vsvy data for timg tag jump of +/-1 sec.

 This file should be used by EFW to batch process the data over the whole mission.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_find_l1_time_tag_irregularity.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_APPLY_L1_TIME_TAG_CORRECTION

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Apply the time tag correction to a certain L1 tplot var.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_phasef_apply_l1_time_tag_correction.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_FIND_L1_TIME_TAG_IRREGULARITY

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Scan L1 esvy and vsvy data for timg tag jump of +/-1 sec.

 This file should be used by EFW to batch process the data over the whole mission.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_phasef_find_l1_time_tag_irregularity.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_GEN_L1_MSCB1_SPLIT[2]

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Split a mscb1 file into several files per hour.

 This file should be used by EFW to batch process the data over the whole mission.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_phasef_gen_l1_mscb1_split.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_GEN_L1_VB1_SPLIT[2]

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Split a vb1 file into several files per hour.

 This file should be used by EFW to batch process the data over the whole mission.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_phasef_gen_l1_vb1_split.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1_TIME_TAG_IRREGULARITY

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read L1 time tag irregularities over the whole mission.
 Save the results in rbspx_efw_l1_isolated_jumps and rbspx_efw_l1_paired_jumps.
 
 To access the info related to the irregularities (jumps in time tag by +/-1 sec)
 isolated_jumps.current_times
 isolated_jumps.previous_times
 paired_jumps.section_start.current_times
 paired_jumps.section_start.previous_times
 paired_jumps.section_end.current_times
 paired_jumps.section_end.previous_times
 
 This is to replace rbsp_efw_read_l1_time_tag_leap_second and 
 rbsp_efw_read_l1_time_tag_correction.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_read_l1_time_tag_irregularity.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1_TIME_TAG_LEAP_SECOND

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read the times when time tags are shifted backward in time by about 1 sec. These times are probably leap second corrections.

 The tplot_var is 'rbspx_l1_time_tag_leap_second'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/l1/rbsp_efw_read_l1_time_tag_leap_second.pro)
